summary: This new code file, genresdocu.html, contributes to the system by creating a web page that displays a list of documentaries. It introduces HTML elements for structuring the page, including a navigation menu with options for Home, About, and Contact pages. Additionally, it includes clickable poster images that link to specific movie pages for further information. This file adds functionality for users to navigate between different pages within the system and view details about specific documentaries.
